module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *12.0.44* FREEPBX-11080 look for 40 character hashes *12.0.43* FREEPBX-9081 trigger voicemail reload instead of module reload *12.0.42* FREEPBX-8275 More work *12.0.41* FREEPBX-8275 Send email when forwarding if setup *12.0.40* FREEPBX-9139 UCP doesn't create voicemail extensions directory for new extensions *12.0.39* Add x in regular expression for channel matching *12.0.38* Language updates *12.0.37* Language updates *12.0.36* Localization Fixes *12.0.35* FREEPBX-9081 UCP changing email address in VM settings does not apply *12.0.34* FREEPBX-8982 click to call/copy for voicemail in UCP *12.0.33* FREEPBX-8927 Badge count equal to 1 when no voicemail *12.0.32* Fix bug in UCP when there are no mailboxes assigned *12.0.31* FREEPBX-8275 Missed Features from ARI Voicemail interface *12.0.30* Remove commented out code, centralize voicemail counter *12.0.29* Bug fixes *12.0.28* FREEPBX-8602, FREEPBX-8575, FREEPBX-8348, plus speed improvements *12.0.27* Audio playback progress and error reporting in UCP *12.0.26* FREEPBX-7723 - allow minpassword to be set from voicemail admin *12.0.25* FREEPBX-8226 Names dont show up on virtual extensions in UCP *12.0.24* Dont support range on a download, cleanup so that cdr and this look similar *12.0.23* Declare the wav file as a usable format *12.0.22* Fixes to allow playback in Safari and Mobile devices (yes including apple and android) *12.0.21* Speeds up load page exponentially in UCP *12.0.20* pagination fixes *12.0.19* FREEPBX-8211 Improvements to UCP Voicemail/CDR Playback *12.0.18* Restructure Voicemail in UCP, FREEPBX-8198 Add pagination, FREEPBX-8207 fix converting process *12.0.17* Add res_mwi_devstate now for 12 installations *12.0.16* Tweaks for UCP *12.0.15* Stop playing voicemails in UCP when they are deleted *12.0.14* FREEPBX-7542 fixes UCP not renumbering voicemails *12.0.13* FREEPBX-7500 Make User voicemail settings uniform *12.0.12* FREEPBX-7326 fixes issue of enabling setting if module doesnt exist. *12.0.11* VmX Temp addition and Fixes and UCP conflict fixes *12.0.10* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *12.0.9* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.8* Cleanup in UCP *12.0.7* Auto Saving for UCP *12.0.6* UCP Module Adjustments *12.0.5* Small fixes for UCP FREEPBX-7293 *12.0.4* Set message limit for UCP display *12.0.3* Work on GUI for button work in Framework, numerous changes and additions for User Control Panel on the backend *12.0.2* FREEPBX-6471 allow asterisk in password field *12.0.1* Use BMO object to add the Asterisk mwi module if it exists
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
